title: Quality Management and Organizational Learning Integration Strategies for Service Enterprises (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business administration and understanding of service industry structures
context.additional_context: Learners are current service industry professionals, focusing on applying quality management theory and organizational learning mechanisms to practice. Conducted in BYOD environments, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core elements of quality management (QM) practice methodologies in service enterprises
Learners can present the correlation between organizational learning processes and QM implementation through case analysis
One can conduct a project to diagnose the level of QM (Quality Matters) implementation and derive improvement strategies.

resources: Service Industry QM (Quality Management) Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
